title: Just went 28/4 with Sona and got reported for it...  Whut?
body: I didn't even hardly say anything past silly things like "I HAVE EVOLVED PAST YOUR CAPACITY TO KILL ME!" and apparently that's report worthy these days?  I've been reported a couple time in the past couple of days.  Had the notification just pop up and a couple days ago right after a match where I literally said nothing.  Do people who abuse the report function get any consequences themselves?

replies.body: Well, if they're dumping a lot of false reports, their report weight drops until eventually they're basically ignored by the system. If it's excessive enough, they can be banned.

If it was urf mode you deserve to be reported for playing sona.

Otherwise, you're fine.

Sona in normals still is extremely powerful, I think my best game with her mid was 34 - 1 so far as an old Sona main. She's still an extremely powerful mid laner due to her constant harass, sustain, and game changing ultimate that is almost always a guranteed kill.

Did I really get downvoted for saying that a Utility Mage is viable in mid lane? It reflects the low capabilities of the current Summoners/Players and their loyalty to the meta.

There's more to mid lane than spamming cntrl-4 with Zed and leaving blood stains on your keyboard with Katarina.

It's URF mode.  It's League in general.  Bad things will happen to you roughly 50% of the time.  Are you going to report everybody because of that statistic?  If that's the case, I think you need to uninstall this RNG simulator and go play with playdough.
Oh of course it was.  haha.  But I have gone 27/7 with her in a normal though.  My best in ranked I think was 13/2.
Irrelevant. You were playing Sona in Urf mode.
well you are taunting your opponents which might be considered BM, so maybe you shouldnt cross-chat if you have nothing good to say
"Taunting"?  Really?  I'm making a joke in a game mode that's exclusively for the purposes of being silly.

It's because you're Sona, and people get salty when supports are played well because they have this mentality that supports... can't carry.

It's like winning a duel with a swordfish. Awesome, but makes your opponent cry like a little bitch. :/

People get very salty when they forget to ban Sona in URF.  Don't worry about it too much, as false reports will make players lose report worth.
Continue to play the song of your people, OP.

You want to be careful about taunting in allchat.

The safe way to show off your fed is to spam laugh when your opponents try to kill you and whenever you are about to kill them. Guaranteed to piss them off and it won't get you banned.
That's the thing.  I wasn't taunting.  At least not intentionally.  If people have such thin skinned, I seriously think they need to rethink playing online multiplayer games.

lol i met an enemy sona saying that URF modes takes no skills, if you use skillshot champs then you're retarded or something along that line...

i was playing morg though and i've kill a lot of zeds and fizz by now but she can just spam q w q w all day without even the need to look and aim at your enemies lol
